responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "643EFBC143CFF5614F295786DCE3AE66", "You\'ve never heard of the Green Scarab? Good! We\'re one of Verra best kept secrets. The Scarab is caravan tavern. We\'re never in the same place twice and were never anywhere longer than a few dawns. Now order or skrug off!")
name: MIDD_0003_TGS_TavernBarkeep_10
